Name: Cubes
About the game: Newly rebooted for a better mind-bending experience. Cubes is a puzzle game that can only comfortably exist in virtual reality. Incorporating a mix of spatial reasoning and logic, Cubes presents a series of multidimensional puzzles using sets of mysterious, floating cubes. You must interact with the cubes and create patterns to fulfill each puzzle and progress. A thoughtful, room-scale VR experience, using the space and motion of virtual reality to pit you against a new kind of puzzle. Features: Challenge yourself in dozens of intriguing VR puzzles. Think in multiple dimensions to meet the requirements of each puzzle. Take on more advanced challenges by applying color to cubes. Controls: Interact - Touch objects (usually cubes) with your cursor. Pull the trigger to interact. Movement - Every level exists within a self-contained, room-scale space. Simply walk around to view the puzzle from different angles. Supported Controllers Vive hand controllers only.
